about_the_game:
Discovery Notes - Fox Fangxing Ruomeng (with 29999 Ling coins) DLC contains the role of Fox Fangxing Ruomeng costume, with the costume attached 29999 Ling coins
_Clouds make stars think, and good times are like dreams for a long time.
Light clouds float in the night sky and twinkling stars appear and disappear. Stars float along the Milky Way like sprays and dewdrops are scattered like a trickle of jade. Every one is a girl's poem and dream.
Western-style Palace wind-pleated skirt with gauze lace pendulum, matched with leather round-headed dance shoes, luxury and elegance reveal the unique witty and lovely girl!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
